benchmark_details.name: Intelligent Contract Information Extraction Dataset
benchmark_details.overview: The paper proposes a high-quality dataset construction method for complex contract information extraction tasks in industrial scenarios, improving model performance through automated annotation and data augmentation.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To construct a large-scale, high-quality dataset of industrial contract texts and enhance the performance of large language models in contract information extraction tasks through fine-tuning.

data.source: Obei Industrial Supply Chain Ecosystem Platform
data.annotation: Automated annotation using GPT-4 and GPT-3.5 with clustering and stratified sampling methods.

methodology.calculation: Field accuracy measures the hit rate of key fields predicted by the model. Field recall evaluates the coverage of structured content against true keys.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy, recall, and efficiency indicate improved performance in extracting contract information.
methodology.baseline_results: Comparative evaluation against models such as GLM-4, Baichuan2, and Qwen.
methodology.validation: Performance evaluation on training and testing datasets to ensure reliability.
